title: Requires police officers to be retrained annually in CPR and creates the offense of failure to administer CPR
summary: Requires police officers to be retrained annually in CPR and creates the offense of failure to administer CPR in the first and second degrees.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating the offense of failure to administer cardiopulmonary resuscitation; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring police officers to be retrained annually in cardiopulmonary resuscitation
